resources.string:

Acceleration (PHONE REFERENCE): X: Y: Z:
Acceleration (WORLD REFERENCE): X: No Movement: Y: No Movement: Z:

Displacement (WORLD REFERENCE): X: Y:

Current Position: X: Y:
